Topic.Title: Moving from one room to another with a key press.

Posts.EditableText: I'm working on a game named "Kamaroy: 2297" a spiritual successor to the original Fallouts but in text based form. Right now Im in the early stages of making the beginning of the game where you create your character. I want the player to be able to move to the first room of the game only after the character is created and only if they press a key on the keyboard, problem is I don't know how to. If anyone knows how to make this possible, do tell.
